calculationDetails.continuousControls: Calculated as average of Semester 1 ({{s1}}) and Semester 2 ({{s2}}) = {{avg}}
calculationDetails.economicsRegional: Arabic ({{ar}}) * 2 + French ({{fr}}) * 3 + Islamic ({{isl}}) * 2 + History-Geography ({{hg}}) * 2 {{#mis}}+ MIS ({{mis}}) * 1{{/mis}} {{#law}}+ Law ({{law}}) * 1{{/law}} / {{coefSum}} = {{avg}}
calculationDetails.mathRegional: Arabic ({{ar}}) * 2 + French ({{fr}}) * 4 + Islamic ({{isl}}) * 2 + History-Geography ({{hg}}) * 2 {{#trans}}+ Translation ({{trans}}) * 2{{/trans}} {{#sport}}+ Sport ({{sport}}) * 1{{/sport}} / {{coefSum}} = {{avg}}
calculationDetails.traditionalRegional: French ({{fr}}) * 3 + History-Geography ({{hg}}) * {{hgCoef}} + Math ({{math}}) * 1 + Documentation ({{doc}}) * 1 {{#ling}}+ Linguistic Sciences ({{ling}}) * 2{{/ling}} {{#faraid}}+ Faraid ({{faraid}}) * 2{{/faraid}} {{#sport}}+ Sport ({{sport}}) * 1{{/sport}} / {{coefSum}} = {{avg}}
calculationDetails.appliedArtsRegional: Math ({{math}}) * 2 + French ({{fr}}) * 4 + Islamic ({{isl}}) * 2 + Arabic ({{ar}}) * 2 {{#itGeo}}+ Computer science and infographics ({{itGeo}}) * 2{{/itGeo}} {{#visualArts}}+ Visual arts and art history ({{visualArts}}) * 2{{/visualArts}} / {{coefSum}} = {{avg}}

scienceNational.agricultural: Math ({{math}}) * 7 + Physics-Chemistry ({{pc}}) * 5 + SVT ({{svt}}) * 5 + Plant/Animal ({{plantAnimal}}) * 5 + Philosophy ({{philo}}) * 2 + English ({{en}}) * 2 / 26 = {{avg}}

calculationDetails.economicsNational: Math ({{math}}) * 4 + Accounting and financial mathematics ({{account}}) * {{accountCoef}} + General economics and statistics ({{genEcon}}) * {{genEconCoef}} + Business econ. & admin. organization ({{econ}}) * {{econCoef}} + Philosophy ({{philo}}) * 2 + English ({{en}}) * 2 / {{coefSum}} = {{avg}}
calculationDetails.mathNational: Math ({{math}}) * 9 + Physics-Chemistry ({{pc}}) * 7 {{#svt}}+ SVT ({{svt}}) * 3{{/svt}} {{#eng}}+ Engineering ({{eng}}) * 3{{/eng}} + Philosophy ({{philo}}) * 2 + English ({{en}}) * 2 / {{coefSum}} = {{avg}}
calculationDetails.traditionalArabicNational: Linguistic Sciences ({{ling}}) * 4 + Literature ({{lit}}) * 5 + Tafsir and Hadith ({{interp}}) * 4 + English ({{en}}) * 2 + Philosophy ({{philo}}) * 2 / 17 = {{avg}}
calculationDetails.traditionalIslamicNational: Literature ({{lit}}) * 4 + Tafsir and Hadith ({{interp}}) * 5 + Fiqh ({{fiqh}}) * 5 + English ({{en}}) * 2 + Philosophy ({{philo}}) * 2 / 18 = {{avg}}
calculationDetails.appliedArtsNational: Product Design Art ({{product}}) * 5 + Communication and Multimedia Design ({{multimedia}}) * 8 + Environmental Design Art ({{env}}) * 5 + English ({{en}}) * 2 + Philosophy ({{philo}}) * 2 / 22 = {{avg}}
calculationDetails.finalAverage: Continuous Controls ({{continuous}}) + Regional Exam ({{regional}}) + National Exam ({{national}}) = {{value}}
calculationDetails.independentTraditionalIslamicRegional: French ({{fr}}) * 3 + History-Geography ({{hg}}) * 2 + Math ({{math}}) * 1 + Documentation ({{doc}}) * 1 + Linguistic Sciences ({{ling}}) * 2 + Faraid ({{faraid}}) * 2 {{#sport}}+ Sport ({{sport}}) * 1{{/sport}} / {{coefSum}}
calculationDetails.independentAppliedArtsRegional: Math ({{math}}) * 2 + French ({{fr}}) * 4 + Islamic ({{isl}}) * 2 + Arabic ({{ar}}) * 2 {{#itGeo}}+ Computer science and infographics ({{itGeo}}) * 2{{/itGeo}} {{#visualArts}}+ Visual arts and art history ({{visualArts}}) * 2{{/visualArts}} {{#sport}}+ Sport ({{sport}}) * 1{{/sport}} / {{coefSum}}
calculationDetails.independentScienceRegional: French ({{fr}}) * 4 + History-Geography ({{hg}}) * 2 + Islamic ({{isl}}) * 2 + Arabic ({{ar}}) * 2 {{#sport}}+ Sport ({{sport}}) * 1{{/sport}} {{#trans}}+ Translation ({{trans}}) * 2{{/trans}} / {{coefSum}}
calculationDetails.independentEconomicsRegional: Arabic ({{ar}}) * 2 + French ({{fr}}) * 3 + Islamic ({{isl}}) * 2 + History-Geography ({{hg}}) * 2 {{#mis}}+ MIS ({{mis}}) * 1{{/mis}} {{#law}}+ Law ({{law}}) * 1{{/law}} {{#sport}}+ Sport ({{sport}}) * 1{{/sport}} / {{coefSum}}
calculationDetails.independentMathRegional: Arabic ({{ar}}) * 2 + French ({{fr}}) * 4 + Islamic ({{isl}}) * 2 + History-Geography ({{hg}}) * 2 {{#trans}}+ Translation ({{trans}}) * 2{{/trans}} {{#sport}}+ Sport ({{sport}}) * 1{{/sport}} / {{coefSum}}
calculationDetails.independentArabicNational: Linguistic Sciences ({{ling}}) * 4 + Literature ({{lit}}) * 5 + Tafsir and Hadith ({{interp}}) * 4 + English ({{en}}) * 2 + Philosophy ({{philo}}) * 2 / 17
calculationDetails.independentIslamicNational: Literature ({{lit}}) * 4 + Tafsir and Hadith ({{interp}}) * 5 + Fiqh ({{fiqh}}) * 5 + English ({{en}}) * 2 + Philosophy ({{philo}}) * 2 / 18
calculationDetails.independentAppliedArtsNational: Product Design Art ({{product}}) * 5 + Communication and Multimedia Design ({{multimedia}}) * 8 + Environmental Design Art ({{env}}) * 5 + English ({{en}}) * 2 + Philosophy ({{philo}}) * 2 / 22
calculationDetails.independentAgriculturalNational: Math ({{math}}) * 7 + Physics-Chemistry ({{pc}}) * 5 + SVT ({{svt}}) * 5 + Plant/Animal ({{plantAnimal}}) * 5 + Philosophy ({{philo}}) * 2 + English ({{en}}) * 2 / 26
calculationDetails.independentEconomicsNational: Math ({{math}}) * 4 + Accounting and financial mathematics ({{account}}) * {{accountCoef}} + General economics and statistics ({{genEcon}}) * {{genEconCoef}} + Business econ. & admin. organization ({{econ}}) * {{econCoef}} + Philosophy ({{philo}}) * 2 + English ({{en}}) * 2 / {{coefSum}}
calculationDetails.independentMathNational: Math ({{math}}) * 9 + Physics-Chemistry ({{pc}}) * 7 {{#svt}}+ SVT ({{svt}}) * 3{{/svt}} {{#eng}}+ Engineering ({{eng}}) * 3{{/eng}} + Philosophy ({{philo}}) * 2 + English ({{en}}) * 2 / {{coefSum}}

support.title: Support the Project
support.description: If you find this app useful, consider supporting its development with a donation.

home.title: Welcome to the Moroccan Baccalaureate Calculator
home.subtitle: An easy tool to calculate your Baccalaureate average according to the official Moroccan system

feature1.title: Accurate
feature1.description: Precise calculations according to official coefficients

howToUse.title: How to Use the Calculator
howToUse.introText: The Moroccan Baccalaureate Calculator allows you to calculate your final average based on your regional, national, and continuous assessment grades.
howToUse.step1: Choose your student type (Regular or Independent)
howToUse.step3: Enter your grades in the designated fields
howToUse.step4: Click the calculate button to get your average
howToUse.audience3: Teachers and educators tracking student progress

section1.title: Information Collection
section1.content: We do not collect any personal information from users. All calculations are done on your device and not stored on our servers.

section2.title: Use of Information
section2.content: We do not use any data you input into the calculator for any purpose other than showing you the results.

section3.title: Protection
section3.content: We care about your privacy. No information is shared with third parties.

about.title: About Us
about.developerText: I'm a solo Moroccan developer passionate about creating digital tools to help students succeed. This calculator was built to simplify the BAC average calculation process and make education more accessible to everyone.
about.whyText: Many Moroccan students struggle to calculate their baccalaureate average correctly. I wanted to create a simple, user-friendly, and accurate tool to solve this problem for everyone.
about.visionText: We aim to make education more accessible and transparent for all Moroccan students.
about.contactText: Have feedback, suggestions, or want to collaborate? You can reach me at:
